application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 9525 Golden Acacia - Lateral reduction back from adjacent property for maximum 2m clearance from building. To abate a nuisance.  Tree height is unchanged, final crown spread 6m.0933 Sycamore - Crown lift to 4m above ground level for pedestrian and vehicle clearance. prune clear of street light for maximum 1m clearance. Tree height is unchanged, final crown spread 5m.0938 Golden Acaia - Lateral prune West aspect by approx 3m to mitigate encroachment to building. remove secondary limb at bifurcation point at 2m, removing west limb. Crown height is unchanged, final crown spread 5m.0925 Honey Locust - Crown lift to 3m for car park clearance and prune clear of light column for max 1m clearance. Crown height and spread unchanged.9518 Lime - Crown lift to 4m above footpath. Crown height and spread unchanged.0946 6x Group - Crown lift to 3m to provide pedestrian clearance. Crown height and spread unchanged.0928 Sycamore - Crown lift to 4m above road. Crown height and spread unchanged. 0950 Fraxinus - Lateral prune by 3m to clear adjacent building. Crown height unchanged, final crown spread 5m.9522 Sycamore - Lateral prune by 2m to clear adjacent building. Crown height unchanged, final crown spread 5m.0935 Wild Cherry - Crown lift to 3m above ground level. Crown height and spread unchanged.0926 Honey Locust - Crown lift to 3m above car park and prune clear of street light for 1m clearance. Crown height and spread unchanged.9524 - Sycamore - Lateral prune back from building for max 2m clearance. Crown height unchanged, final spread 6m.0930 2x Group - Prune back to curb line for highway clearance crown height unchanged, final spread 2m.4021 2x Group - Crown lift to 4m for highway clearance & crown reduce by 3m retaining final crown height of 12m and spread of 5m.4027 Golden Acaia - Crown reduce by 4m to mitigate leverage on basal cavity and retain specimen at 8m height and 3m spread.All works to BS3998:2010.
